summary:
The MCU is a huge media franchise with movies, TV shows, and more, all connected like a giant puzzle. It started with the *Iron Man* movie in 2008. The stories and characters from Marvel Comics come to life on screen.

Marvel Studios makes these films in groups called "Phases." Each phase has a big story arc, like "The Infinity Saga" and "The Multiverse Saga." The shows and movies are set in the same world, with some characters appearing in multiple stories.

The MCU is very popular and has made a lot of money. It's inspired other companies to create their own shared universes.
title: Marvel Cinematic Universe
